Name: Grande Champagne Cosmo
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: 'Grande Champagne' refers to the top cru of the Cognac region: this brandy-based cocktail is suitably elite.
History: Created in the early noughties by yours truly. Cosmopolitan cocktail history and recipe variations
Nutrition: One serving of Grande Champagne Cosmo contains 182 calories
